alpha.title: Tweeten Alpha 10
alpha.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Build 10 to testers in the alpha update channel.

The update includes new improvements.

Here's what's new:

  • Lots and lots of bug fixes

beta.title: Tweeten Beta 1.9
beta.description:
Hi everyone,

Today, we are releasing Tweeten Beta 1.9 for Windows and Mac with the following new features and improvements:

  • You can now enable classic TweetDeck style for Like and RT icons
  • You can now disable Twitter Card and Poll Integration (recommended)
  • You can now enabled squared images instead of the rounded images
  • You can now disable the spell checker
  • You can now enable an indicator for conversations and threads
  • You can now make the columns even slimmer
  • [Windows] We've fixed an issue which caused the app to show wrong info on Program and Features
  • [OS X] We've fixed the icon issue, and it now appears properly on OS X
  • Other minor improvements

As usual, if you have any feedback, please let us know via Twitter (@tweetenapp). Happy Tweeting!

chrome.title: Tweeten Beta 1.8
chrome.description:
Today, we are releasing Tweeten Beta 1.8 for Chrome.

We have fixed the Report Tweet and Add to list modals which didn't show the text properly before with the latest update.

As usual, if you have any feedback, please let us know via Twitter (@tweetenapp). Happy Tweeting!

edge.title: Tweeten Beta 1.8.1
edge.description:
Hi everyone,

Today, we are releasing Tweeten Beta 1.8.1 for Edge

With 1.8.1, we have added support for Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14316.

Additionally, we have also updated the logos for our extension and added a quick link to launch TweetDeck from Options

As usual, if you have any feedback, please let us know via Twitter (@tweetenapp).

Happy Tweeting!
